src_original: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhran na tu cetasā tat /
tgt_original: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhranna tu cetasā tat |

src_original: bhāryāgatair eva manovitakair jehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ // Saund_7.1 //
tgt_original: bhāryāgataireva manovitarkairjehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ ||1 ||

src_original: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ /
tgt_original: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ |

src_original: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma // Saund_7.2 //
tgt_original: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma ||2 ||

src_original: sthitaḥ sa dīnaḥ sahakāravīthyām ālīnasaṃmūrchitaṣatpadāyām /  bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhur dhyātvā priyāṃ cāpam ivācakarṣa // Saund_7.3 //  sa pitakṣodam iva pratīcchan cūtadrumbheyas tanupuṣpavarṣam /
tgt_original: sthitaḥ saḥ dīnaḥ sahakāravīthyāmālīnasaṃmūrcchitaṣaṭpadāyām |  bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhurdhyātvā priyāṃ cāpamivācakarṣa ||3 ||  sa pītakakṣodamiva pratīcchan cūtadrumebhyastanupuṣpavarṣam |

src_original: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ // Saund_7.4 //
tgt_original: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ ||4 ||

src_original: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya kartā pratigarvitānām /  aśokam ālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokavanāṃ śuśoca // Saund_7.5 //  priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṇguṃ niśāmya bhītām iva niṣpatantim /  sasmāra tām aśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām // Saund_7.6 //
tgt_original: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya karttā pratigarvitānām |  aśokamālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokakavanāṃ śuśoca ||5 ||  priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṅguṃ niśāmya bhītāmiva niṣpatantīm |  sasmāra tāmaśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām ||6 ||

src_original: puṣpāvanaddhe tilakadrumasya dṛṣṭvānyapuṣṭāṃ śikhare niviṣṭām /  saṃkalpayām āsa śikhāṃ priyāyāḥ śuklāṃśuke 'ṭṭālam apāsritāyāḥ // Saund_7.7 //  latāṃ praphullām atimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām /
tgt_original: puṣpāvanaddhe tilakadrumasya dṛṣṭvānyapuṣṭāṃ śikhare niviṣṭām |  saṃkalpayāmāsa śikhāṃ priyāyāḥ śuklāṃśuke'ṭṭālapāśritāyāḥ ||7 ||  latāṃ praphullāmatimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām |

src_original: niśāmya cintām agamat tadaivaṃ śliṣṭābhavan mām api sundarīti // Saund_7.8 //
tgt_original: niśāmya cintāmagamattadaivaṃ śliṣṭā bhavenmāmapi sundarīti ||8 ||

src_original: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgair iva hemagarbhaiḥ /  kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣur ācikṣipur asya tatra // Saund_7.9 //
tgt_original: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgairiva hemagarbhaiḥ |  kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣurācikṣipurasya tatra ||9 ||

src_original: gandhaṃ vasanto 'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveṣyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ /
tgt_original: gandhaṃ vamanto'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveśyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ |

src_original: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na jahrur hṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ // Saund_7.10 //
tgt_original: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na janhurhṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ ||10 ||

src_original: saṃraktakaṇṭhaiś ca vinīlakaṇṭhais tuṣṭaiḥ prahṛṣṭair api cānyapuṣṭaiḥ /  lelihyamānaiś ca madhu dvirepaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda // Saund_7.11 //
tgt_original: saṃraktakaṇṭhaiśca vinīlakaṇṭhaistuṣṭaiḥ prahṛṣṭairapi cānyapuṣṭaiḥ |  lelihyamānaiśca madhu dvirephaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda ||11 ||

src_original: sa tatra bhāryāraṇisaṃbhavena vitarkadhūmena tamaḥśikhena /  kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tat tat // Saund_7.12 //
tgt_original: sa tatra bhāryāraṇisaṃbhavena vitarkadhūmena tamaḥśikhena |  kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tattat ||12 ||

src_original: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca /
tgt_original: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca |

src_original: tyaktvā priyām aśrumukhīṃ tapo ye ceruś cariṣyanti caranti caiva // Saund_7.13 //
tgt_original: tyaktvā priyāmaśrumukhīṃ tapo ye cerūścariṣyanti caranti caiva ||13 ||

src_original: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam asti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavam āyasaṃ vā /
tgt_original: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanamasti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavamāyasaṃ vā |

src_original: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam etad eva mukhaṃ calśkṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam // Saund_7.14 //
tgt_original: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanametadeva mukhaṃ calākṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam ||14 ||

src_original: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāc caiva suhṛdbalāc ca /
tgt_original: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāccaiva suhṛdbalācca |

src_original: jñānāc ca raukṣyāc ca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayas tu pāśaḥ // Saund_7.15 //
tgt_original: jñānācca raukṣyācca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayastu pāśaḥ ||15 ||

src_original: jñānaṃ na me tac ca śamāya yat syān na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako 'smi /
tgt_original: jñānaṃ na me tacca śamāya yat syānna na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako'smi |

src_original: kāmātmakaś cāsmi guruś ca buddhaḥ sthito 'ntare cakragater ivāsmi // Saund_7.16 //
tgt_original: kāmātmakaścāsmi guruśca buddhaḥ sthito'ntare cakragaterivāsmi ||16 ||

src_original: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dvirguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ /
tgt_original: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dviguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ |

src_original: sarvāsv avasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogād iva cakravākaḥ // Saund_7.17 //
tgt_original: sarvāsvavasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogādiva cakravākaḥ ||17 ||

src_original: adyāpi tan me hṛdi vartate ca yad darpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā /  kṛtānṛtakrodhakam abravīn māṃ kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti śaṭhaṃ hasantī // Saund_7.18 //
tgt_original: adyāpi tanme hṛdi vartate ca yaddarpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā |  kṛtānutakrodhakamabravīnmāṃ kathaṃkṛto'sīti śaṭhaṃ hasantī ||18 ||

src_original: yathaiṣy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayīti yan mām avadac ca sāśru /
tgt_original: yathaiṣyanāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayīti yanmāmavadacca sāśru |

src_original: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tan me vaco 'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi // Saund_7.19 //
tgt_original: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tanme vaco'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi ||19 ||

src_original: baddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣur eṣaḥ /
tgt_original: buddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣureṣaḥ |

src_original: saktaḥ kva cin nāham ivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntas tathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ // Saund_7.20 //
tgt_original: saktaḥ kvacinnāhamivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntastathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ ||20 ||

src_original: puṃskokilānām avicintya ghoṣaṃ vasantalakṣmyām avicārya cakṣuḥ /
tgt_original: puṃskokilānāmavicintya ghoṣaṃ vasantalakṣmyāmavicārya cakṣuḥ |

src_original: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ // Saund_7.21 //
tgt_original: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ ||21 ||

src_original: asmai namo 'stu sthiraniścayāya nivṛttakautūhalavismayāya /
tgt_original: asmai namo'stu sthiraniścayāya nivṛttakautūhalavismayāya |

src_original: śāntātmane 'ntargatamānasāya caṅkramyamāṇāya nirutsukāya // Saund_7.22 //
tgt_original: śāntātmane'ntargatamānāsāya caṅkramyamāṇāya nirutsukāya ||22 ||

src_original: nirīkṣamāṇāya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam /
tgt_original: nirīkṣamāṇasya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam |

src_original: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ /
tgt_original: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte ||23 ||  bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ |

src_original: jahruḥ striyo devanṛparṣisaṃghān kasmād dhi nāsmadvidham āṣipeyuḥ // Saund_7.24 //
tgt_original: jahruḥ striyo devanṛparṣisaṃghān kasmāddhi nāsmadvidhamākṣipeyuḥ ||24 ||

src_original: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve maghavān ahalyām /
tgt_original: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve madhavānahalyām |

src_original: sattvena sargeña ca tena hīnaḥ strīnirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo 'ham // Saund_7.25 //
tgt_original: sattvena sargeṇa ca tena hīnaḥ strinirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo'ham ||25 ||

src_original: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgas tatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ /
tgt_original: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgastatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ |

src_original: yām aśvabhūto 'śvavadhuṃ sametya yato 'śvinau tau janayāṃ babhūva // Saund_7.26 //
tgt_original: ratamaśvabhūto'śvavadhūṃ sametya yato'śvinau tau janayāṃbabhūva ||26 ||

src_original: strīkāraṇaṃ vairaviṣaktabuddhyor vaivasvatāgnyoś calitātmadhṛtyoḥ /  bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caled ihānyaḥ // Saund_7.27 //
tgt_original: strīkāraṇaṃ vairaviśaktabuddhyorvaivasvatāgnyoścalitātmadhṛtyoḥ |  bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caledihānyaḥ ||27 ||

src_original: bheje śvapākīṃ munir akṣamālāṃ kāmād vaiṣṭhaś ca sa sadvariṣṭaḥ /  yasyāṃ vivasvān iva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto 'sya kapiñjalādaḥ // Saund_7.28 //
tgt_original: bheje śvapākīṃ munirakṣamālāṃ kāmādvasiṣṭhaśca sa sadvariṣṭhaḥ |  yasyāṃ vivaśvāniva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto'sya kapiñjalādaḥ ||28 ||

src_original: parāśaḥ śāpaśaras taharṣiḥ kālīṃ siṣeve jhaṣagarbhayonim /
tgt_original: parāśaraḥ śāpaśarastatharṣiḥ kālīṃ siṣeve jhaṣagarbhayonim |

src_original: suto 'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakartā // Saund_7.29 //
tgt_original: suto'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakarttā ||29 ||

src_original: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyañaś ca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhva /
tgt_original: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyaṇaśca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhvā |

src_original: yayā hato 'bhūc calanūpureña pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ // Saund_7.30 //
tgt_original: yayā hato'bhūccalanūpureṇa pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ ||30 ||

src_original: tathāñgirā rāgaparītacetāḥ sarasvatīṃ brahmasutaḥ siṣeve /
tgt_original: tathāṅgirā rāgaparītacetāḥ sarasvatīṃ brahmasutaḥ siṣeve |

src_original: sārasvato yatra suto 'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā // Saund_7.31 //  tathā nṛparṣer dilipasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ /
tgt_original: sārasvato yatra suto'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā ||31 ||  tathā nṛparṣerdilīpasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ |

src_original: srucaṃ gṛhītvā sravad ātmatejaś cikṣepa vahnāv asito yato 'bhūt // Saund_7.32 //
tgt_original: sruvaṃ gṛhītvā sravadātmatejaścikṣepa vahrāvasito yato'bhūt ||32 ||

src_original: tathāṅgado 'ntaṃ tapaso 'pi gatvā kāmābhibhūto yamunām agacchat /
tgt_original: tathā'ṅgado'ntaṃ tapaso'pi gatvā kāmābhibhūto yamunāmagacchat |

src_original: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rahītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāṃ babhūva // Saund_7.33 //
tgt_original: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rathītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāmbabhūva ||33 ||

src_original: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane 'pi śānte 'pi ca vartamānaḥ /  cacāla dhairyān munir ṛṣyaṣṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ // Saund_7.34 //
tgt_original: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane'pi śānte'pi ca vartamānaḥ |  cacāla dhairyānmuniṛṣyaśrṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśrṛṅgaḥ ||34 ||

src_original: brahmarṣibhāvārtham apāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣv anāsthaḥ /  sa gādhijaś cāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda // Saund_7.35 //
tgt_original: brahmarṣibhāvārthamapāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣvanāsthaḥ |  sa gādhijaścāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda ||35 ||

src_original: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati stuḥilaśirā mumūrcha /  yaḥ kāmaroṣātmatayānapekṣaḥ śaśāpa tām apratigṛhyamāṇaḥ // Saund_7.36 //
tgt_original: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati sthūlaśirā mumūrccha |  yaḥ kāmaroṣātmatayānapekṣaḥ śaśāpa tāmapratigṛhyamāṇaḥ ||36 ||

src_original: pramadvarāyāṃ ca ruruḥ priyāyāṃ bhujaṅgamenāpahṛtendriyāyām /
tgt_original: pramadvarāyāṃ ca ruruḥ priyāyāṃ bhujaṅgamenāpahṛtendriyāyām |

src_original: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa // Saund_7.37 //
tgt_original: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa ||37 ||

src_original: naptā śaśāṅkasya yaśoguṇāṅko budhasya sūnur vibhudhaprabhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: naptā śaśāṅkasya yaśoguṇāṅko budhasya sūnurvibudhaprabhāvaḥ |

src_original: tathorvaśīm apsarasaṃ vicintya rājarṣir unmādam agacchad aiḍaḥ // Saund_7.38 //
tgt_original: tathorvaśīmapsarasaṃ vicintya rājarṣirunmādamagacchadaiḍaḥ ||38 ||

src_original: rakto girer mūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvāc ca sa tāljaṅghaḥ /
tgt_original: rakto girermūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvācca sa tālajaṅghaḥ |

src_original: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne // Saund_7.39 //
tgt_original: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne ||39 ||

src_original: jahnuś ca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatir bhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ // Saund_7.40 //  nṛpaś ca gaṅgāvirahāj jughūrṇa gaṅgāmbhasā sāla ivāttamūlaḥ /
tgt_original: janhuśca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatirbhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ ||40 ||  nṛpaśca gaṅgāvirahājjughūrṇa gaṅgāmbhasā sāla ivāttamūlaḥ |

src_original: kulapradīpaḥ pratipasya sūnuḥ śrīmattanuḥ śantanur asvatantraḥ // Saund_7.41 //
tgt_original: kulapradīpaḥ pratipasya sūnuḥ śrīmattanuḥ śantanurasvatantraḥ ||41 ||

src_original: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānuśocan prāptām invorvīṃ striyam urvaśīṃ tām /
tgt_original: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānu'śocan prāptāmivorvīṃ striyamurvaśīṃ tām |

src_original: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma cittodhavabhinnavarmā // Saund_7.42 //
tgt_original: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma citodbhavabhinnavarmā ||42 ||

src_original: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ /
tgt_original: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ |

src_original: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatir deva ivāttasenaḥ // Saund_7.43 //  svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihirṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ /
tgt_original: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatirdeva ivāttasenaḥ ||43 ||  svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihīrṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ |

src_original: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmhatham utsasarje // Saund_7.44 //
tgt_original: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmathamutsasarja ||44 ||

src_original: śaptaś ca pāṇḍur madanena nūnaṃ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
tgt_original: śaptaśca pāṇḍurmadanena nūnaṃ strīsaṃgame mṛtyumavāpsyasīti |

src_original: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpād asevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
tgt_original: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpādasevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum ||45 ||

src_original: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghaḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
tgt_original: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghāḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ |

src_original: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyām apaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham // Saund_7.46 //
tgt_original: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyāmapaśyan kimu viklavo'ham ||46 ||

src_original: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛham eva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
tgt_original: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛhameva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam |

src_original: na hy anyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāc cyutasya // Saund_7.47 //
tgt_original: na hyanyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāccyutasya ||47 ||

src_original: pāṇau kapālam avadhāya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ māna nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
tgt_original: pāṇau kapālamavadhārya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ mānaṃ nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ |

src_original: yasyoyoddhavo na dhṛtir asti na śānti asti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48 //
tgt_original: yasyoddhavo na dhṛtirasti na śāntirasti citrapradīpa iva so'sti ca nāsti caiva ||48 ||

src_original: yo niḥsṛtaś ca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyam udvahati yo na ca niṣkasāyaḥ /  pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇair na ca pātrabhūto kiṅgaṃ vahann api sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49 //
tgt_original: yo niḥsṛtaśca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyamudvahati yo na ca niṣkaṣāyaḥ |  pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇairna ca pātrabhūto liṅgaṃ vahannapi sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ ||49 ||

src_original: na nyāyyam anvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktum iti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
tgt_original: na nyāyyamanvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktumiti yo'pi hi me vicāraḥ |

src_original: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāṃs tān ye tapovanaṃ apāsya gṛhāṇy atīyuḥ // Saund_7.50 //
tgt_original: so'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāstānye tapovanamapāsya gṛhāṇyatīyuḥ ||50 ||

src_original: śālvādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndhva eva sa ca sāṃkṛtir antidevaḥ /
tgt_original: śālbādhipo hi sasuto'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo'ndha eva sa ca sāṃskṛtirantidevaḥ |

src_original: cīrāṇy apāsya dadhire punar aṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāṣ ca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51 //
tgt_original: cīrāṇyapāsya dadhire punaraṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāśca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ ||51 ||

src_original: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gurur ito yāvad eva prayātas tyaktvā kāṣāyaṃ gṛham aham itas tāvad eva prayāsye /
tgt_original: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gururito yāvadeva prayāt-  styaktvā kāṣāyaṃ gṛhamahamitastāvadeva prayāsye |

src_original: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher nāmutrārthaḥ syād upahatamater nāpy ayaṃ jīvalokaḥ // Saund_7.52 //
tgt_original: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skhalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddhe-  rnāmutrārthaḥ syādupahatamaternāpyayaṃ jīvalokaḥ ||52 ||

src_original: Saundarananda mahākāvye nandivlāpo nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ /
tgt_original: saundarananda mahākāvye “nanda-vilāpa“ nāma saptama sarga samāpta |
